message.name: ERR_CASECLOSURE_XFV_CASESTATUS
message.locale: The status of the case is %1s, the closure details cannot be modified

message.name: ERR_CASECLOSURE_XFV_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: New case closure date may not be later than today

message.name: ERR_CASEHEADER_FV_CASEOPEN
message.locale: This case contains programs that are still current. The case cannot be closed unless all associated programs are closed.

message.name: INF_CASEREACTIVATION_REACTIVATE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been reactivated by %4s.

message.name: ERR_CASEREACTIVATION_CASESTATUS_INCORRECT
message.locale: Case with status %1s cannot be reactivated

message.name: ERR_CASECLOSURE_FV_NO_CLOSURE
message.locale: There are no closure details on this case

message.name: ERR_CASEREACTIVATION_XRV_CASE_OWNER_CLOSED
message.locale: The current owner of the case is closed and the case cannot be reactivated.

message.name: ERR_CASECLOSURE_XFV_CLOSURE_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: New case closure date may not be earlier than the case start date.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n - maximum allowed is %2n.
